name: mansion
desc: A stately library for crafting and deciphering ANSI escape codes/sequences.

name: AlternateScreen
desc: An escape code that enters or leaves the alternate screen buffer.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: writeAnsiString
desc: Write as a UTF-16 ANSI escaped string to the given StringSink.

name: AnsiCodec
desc: An AnsiCodec allows encoding and decoding ANSI escape codes.

name: AnsiCodec
desc: Creates an ANSI codec.

name: allowInvalid
desc: Whether to allow malformed input.

name: decoder
desc: Returns the decoder of this, converting from T to S.

name: encoder
desc: Returns the encoder from S to T.

name: AnsiDecoder
desc: Converts a string with ANSI escape codes to a list of Sequences.

name: AnsiDecoder
desc: Creates an ANSI decoder.

name: allowInvalid
desc: Whether to allow malformed input.

name: convert
desc: Converts input and returns the result of the conversion.

name: startChunkedConversion
desc: Starts a chunked conversion.

name: AnsiEncoder
desc: Encodes Sequences to ANSI escape codes.

name: AnsiEncoder
desc: Creates an ANSI encoder.

name: allowInvalid
desc: Whether to allow malformed input.

name: convert
desc: Converts input and returns the result of the conversion.

name: AnsiStringSink
desc: Provides extension methods for writing ANSI Sequences to a StringSink.

name: syncAnsiUpdate
desc: Performs a set of actions within a synchronous update block.

name: writeAnsi
desc: Writes the given sequence as an ANSI escaped string.

name: writeAnsiAll
desc: Writes the given sequences as multiple ANSI escaped strings.

name: AnsifyString
desc: Provides extension methods for transforming strings into ANSI strings.

name: style
desc: Transforms the given string into having a one or more styles applied.

name: AsciiControl
desc: An escaped code that represents a single ASCII control character.

desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: writeAnsiString
desc: Write as a UTF-16 ANSI escaped string to the given StringSink.

name: Color
desc: Represents a color that can be used in ANSI escape codes, i.e. SetStyles.

name: black
desc: The color black.

name: blue
desc: The color blue.

name: brightBlack
desc: The color bright black.

name: brightBlue
desc: The color bright blue.

name: brightCyan
desc: The color bright cyan.

name: brightGreen
desc: The color bright green.

name: brightMagenta
desc: The color bright magenta.

name: brightRed
desc: The color bright red.

name: brightWhite
desc: The color bright white.

name: brightYellow
desc: The color bright yellow.

name: cyan
desc: The color cyan.

name: Color.from256
desc: Creates a color from an 8-bit index in the 256-color palette.

name: Color.fromRGB
desc: Creates a color from an 24-bit RGB value.

name: green
desc: The color green.

name: magenta
desc: The color magenta.

name: red
desc: The color red.

name: reset
desc: A color that resets the current color to the terminal's default.

name: white
desc: The color white.

name: yellow
desc: The color yellow.

name: Color4
desc: The base 16 (4-bit) colors available on almost all terminals.

name: bright
desc: A subset of values; 8 bright colors, sometimes called light.

name: dim
desc: A subset of values; 8 original colors, sometimes called dim or dark.

name: isBright
desc: Whether this color is a bright or light color.

name: isDim
desc: Whether this color is a dim or dark color.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: Color8
desc: An extended color palette that includes the base 16 colors and 240 more.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: Color8.fromIndex
desc: Creates a Color8 with the bottom 8-bits of the provided int value.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: index
desc: The index of the color in the 256-color palette.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: values
desc: The 256-color palette.

name: Color24
desc: A 24-bit RGB color.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: Color24
desc: Creates a Color24 from the lower 24-bits of the provided int value.

name: blue
desc: The 8-bit blue component of the color.

name: Color24.fromRGB
desc: Creates a Color24 from the provided red, green, and blue values.

name: generate
desc: The 24-bit color palette.

name: green
desc: The 8-bit green component of the color.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: red
desc: The 8-bit red component of the color.

name: toRGB
desc: Returns the 24-bit RGB value of the color.

desc: A string representation of this object.

name: ColorReset
desc: A sentinel value that resets the current color to the terminal's default.

desc: The equality operator.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: ControlKey
desc: Represents a control key.

desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: CursorPosition
desc: An escape code that sets the cursor position, either relative or absolute.

name: CursorPosition.moveDown
desc: Creates an escape code that moves the cursor down by rows.

name: CursorPosition.moveLeft
desc: Creates an escape code that moves the cursor left by columns.

name: CursorPosition.moveRight
desc: Creates an escape code that moves the cursor right by columns.

name: CursorPosition.moveTo
desc: Creates an escape code that moves the cursor to (row, column).

name: CursorPosition.moveToColumn
desc: Creates an escape code that moves the cursor to the given column.

name: CursorPosition.moveUp
desc: Creates an escape code that moves the cursor up by rows.

name: reset
desc: An escape code that moves the cursor to the top-left corner.

name: resetColumn
desc: An escape code that moves the cursor to the left-most column.

name: restore
desc: An escape code that restores a previously saved cursor position.

name: save
desc: An escape code that saves the current cursor position.

name: CursorStyle
desc: An escape code that sets the cursor style.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

desc: Write as a UTF-16 ANSI escaped string to the given StringSink.

name: Escape
desc: Base type for escape codes, a sequence with a special non-literal meaning.

name: Style
desc: A marker type that represents a style that can be applied to the terminal.

name: Style.background
desc: Creates a style that sets the background color to color.

name: blinkRapid
desc: Rapid blink, typically 150+ blinks per minute.

name: blinkSlow
desc: Slow blink, typically less than 150 blinks per minute.

name: bold
desc: Increases the text intensity.

name: dim
desc: Decreases the text intensity.

name: encircled
desc: Encircled text.

name: Style.foreground
desc: Creates a style that sets the foreground color to color.

name: fraktur
desc: Fraktur text, which is a German style of blackletter.

name: framed
desc: Framed text.

name: hidden
desc: Hides the text.

name: ideogramDoubleOverline
desc: Ideogram double overline.

name: ideogramDoubleUnderline
desc: Ideogram double underline.

name: ideogramOverline
desc: Ideogram overline.

name: ideogramStressMarking
desc: Ideogram stress marking.

name: ideogramUnderline
desc: Ideogram underline.

name: invert
desc: Inverts the foreground and background colors.

name: italic
desc: Emphasizes the text.

name: noBlink
desc: Disables blinkSlow or blinkRapid attribute.

name: noBoldOrDim
desc: Disables bold or dim attribute.

name: noBoldOrDoubleUnderline
desc: Disables the bold or ideogramDoubleUnderline attribute.

name: noFramedOrEncircled
desc: Disables the framed or encircled attribute.

name: noHidden
desc: Disables the hidden attribute.

name: noIdeogramAttributes
desc: No ideogram attributes.

name: noItalicOrFraktur
desc: Disables the italic or fraktur attribute.

name: noOverlined
desc: Disables the overlined attribute.

name: noReverse
desc: Disables the invert attribute.

name: noStrikeThrough
desc: Disables the strikeThrough attribute.

name: noUnderline
desc: Disables underline attribute.

name: overlined
desc: Overlined text.

name: reset
desc: Resets all styles to their default values.

name: strikeThrough
desc: Strikes through the text.

name: underline
desc: Underlines the text.
